webscript.description:
This webscript can be used to update an existing property definition.

There is currently support only for updating the label and/or for adding a constraint.
Also, the current implementation supports only a single constraint on a property definition.
With this in mind, if a call is made to put a constraint on a property definition that already
contains one, the existing constraint will be replaced.

The body of the PUT should be in the form, e.g.
{
   "label": "updated label value",
   "constraintRef": "rmc:constraintName",
}
